snippet: Ángel Gurría, secretary general of the O.E.C.D., said the world should eliminate all emissions from burning fossil fuels before the century is over.
lead_paragraph: Ángel Gurría, secretary general of the O.E.C.D., said the world should eliminate all emissions from burning fossil fuels before the century is over.

headline.main: O.E.C.D. Head Calls for Global Effort Against Climate Change
